pr_title: Decks: Strip whitespace in children as well as parents

timeline.message:
move _removeSpace to _checkDeckTree

There was no reason to do it otherwhere, and it could cause problem as it did not update name map.

timeline.bodyText:
I was referring to a test to ensure that a deck with a trailing newline in the parent won't break the system from a higher level
Something along the lines of:
Build:

A::B\n
A::B\n::C
A::B\n::D\n
Ensure that deckDueTree works

And ensure that the deck list can be built.
timeline.author: david-allison-1
